message_1: Let A = {1, 3, 5, 7} and B = {2, 4, 6, 8} be two sets. Find the intersection of A and B.
message_2: The intersection of two sets A and B is the set of elements that are common to both A and B. In this case, there are no common elements between set A and set B. Therefore, the intersection of A and B is an empty set, denoted as âˆ… or {}.
